NGO.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: an organization which helps people, protects the environment etc and which is not run by a government
NGO.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: non-governmental organization; an organization which helps people, protects the environment etc and which is not run by a government
NGO.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: She agrees there is a challenge facing established NGOs in renewing their supporter base.
